dataRoles.name: duration
dataRoles.description: Task duration in work days for CPM calc

dataRoles.name: taskTotalFloat
dataRoles.description: User-provided total float value for Float-Based mode (optional)

dataRoles.name: taskFreeFloat
dataRoles.description: Free float value for each task

dataRoles.name: manualStartDate
dataRoles.description: User-defined start date for visualization (does not affect calculation)

dataRoles.name: manualFinishDate
dataRoles.description: User-defined finish date for visualization (does not affect calculation)

dataRoles.name: relationshipLag
dataRoles.description: Lag or lead time for relationship
